definition: Jinghai county in Tianjin 天津[Tian1 jin1]/Sea of Tranquillity (on the moon)
still/calm/quiet/not moving
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
Jinghai county in Tianjin 天津[Tian1 jin1]

sentences.english: Apollo 11's lunar module onto the Sea of Tranquillity, and promptly fluffed his lines.
sentences.chinese: 號的登月艙，到達靜海，並迅速抖開繩索。

sentences.english: We made a perfect landing beside a small crater in the Sea of Tranquillity.
sentences.chinese: 我們在靜海的一個小隕石坑旁安全着陸。

sentences.english: Listeners on Earth heard the countdown from Tranquility Base.
sentences.chinese: 地球上的聽衆聽到靜海谷底倒計時的聲音。

sentences.english: Scuttling across the floors of silent seas.
sentences.chinese: 破浪疾行於寧靜海的地面。

sentences.english: Great changes have in Jinghai recently.
sentences.chinese: 最近靜海發生了很大的變化。
